lead_paragraph: Amazon.com Inc has launched a new program to help students build capabilities into its voice-controlled assistant Alexa, the company told Reuters, the latest move by a technology firm to nurture ideas and talent in artificial intelligence research.

headline.main: Who’s That on the Grill in ‘Barbecue’?
